channel.title: machine-learning on Stephen Malina

item.title: Paper Review - DeepBind
item.description: In which I record my thoughts on DeepBind. What is this paper about? The authors of this paper designed a conv net model to predict how well different proteins will bind to sequences of DNA or RNA. They train one model per protein for many different sequences and show that these models can predict binding affinities for sequences well enough to produce insights regarding the impact of single nucleotide mutations.
